string-array.name: beans_responses
string-array.item: The beans are on aisle 14, next to the condiments
The beans are on aisle 14. You can find them next to the condiments.

string-array.name: jam_responses
string-array.item: The jam can be found on aisle 8, near the bakery
The jam is on aisle 8 - may we recommend Zebra Brand Jam?

string-array.name: bread_responses
string-array.item: We have a wide selection of bread on aisle 3
The bread can be found on aisle 3, but we also have freshly baked loafs at our bakery near aisle 8

string-array.name: beer_responses
string-array.item: Beer can be found on aisle 21
The beer is on aisle 21, why not try out some of our newly stocked craft beer?
The beer is located on aisle 21, towards the back of the store

string-array.name: toiletries_responses
string-array.item: The toiletries are on aisle 18. We currently have an offer on our shampoo!
Toiletries can be found on aisle 18
